title: Side Effects of an Educator: Pranoo Kumar
description:
This week we continue our educator series with kindergarten teacher turned revolutionary reader Pranoo Kumar of Rohi’s Readery.
IG @rohisreadery + @pranoo_k
Trigger warning: discussion around suicidal thoughts (from 07:00-15:00)
~
Get tickets to The Black Outside Again Tour! amandaseales.com/tourdates
~
